notes: Spacious, well-maintained apartment with modern fixtures including recessed lighting, split AC units, and quality wood finishes. The unit has large windows providing good natural light, marble/tile flooring in living areas and wood flooring in bedrooms. For baby safety, the glass coffee table with sharp edges and decorative metal dog statue in living room would need to be addressed; no dangerous balcony railings or stairs visible. Overall clean and high-quality condition suitable for a family.
